title: Bug 71076Missing Javadoc comments that aren't missing
description: Bug 71076Missing Javadoc comments that aren't missing Reported in the AJDT newsgroup:Go to PreferencesJavaCompilerJavadoc and set "Missing javadoc comments"to "Warning".You then get warnings against things you wouldn't expect, such as after advice./A comment /public aspect World {pointcut greeting() : execution( Hello.sayHello(..));/A comment /after() returning : greeting() {System.out.println("world");}}This gives two warnings, one for the aspect itself, and one for the afterreturning advice. The warnings occur both with and without the existence ofJavadoc comments!
